detectors.description: Lotto.calculateWinner(uint256,uint256) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#35-55) uses a weak PRNG: "winningTicketIndex = uint256(decisionBlockHash) % rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#43)"

Deprecated standard detected decisionBlockHash = block.blockhash(decisionBlockNumber) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#42):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description:

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#112-133):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - value) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#121)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#125)

	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#131)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lotto_4round.sol#132)
